quote: Time wasn't the same anymore. Doors were slamming shut before we even knew they'd been opened. Good fortune can take forever to get to you, but as it turns out, sorrow is as quick as a shot.
quote_letters: TIME WASNT THE SAME ANYMORE DOORS WERE SLAMMING SHUT BEFORE WE EVEN KNEW THEYD BEEN OPENED GOOD FORTUNE CAN TAKE FOREVER TO GET TO YOU BUT AS IT TURNS OUT SORROW IS AS QUICK AS A SHOT
